message: Cannot combine AUTOINCREMENT and multiple primary keys in SQLite.
details:

CREATE TABLE wp_readbloggcm ( id mediumint(9) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, TIME datetime DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00' NOT NULL, gcm varchar(190) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY id (id), UNIQUE KEY gcm (gcm) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4
